meanings.definition: The quality or state of being packed tightly together.
meanings.sent1: The packnesses of the books on the shelf made it hard to find the one I needed.
meanings.sent2: The packnesses of the crowd at the concert made it difficult to move around.
meanings.sent3: The packnesses of the puzzle pieces on the table made it challenging to put them together.
meanings.sent4: The packnesses of the stars in the night sky created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The packnesses of the flowers in the garden created a colorful display.

meanings.definition: The act of packing or organizing items into a container or space.
meanings.sent1: She was in charge of the packnesses of the boxes in the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The packnesses of the suitcase was done carefully to fit all the clothes.
meanings.sent3: The packnesses of the lunchbox was so perfect that everything stayed fresh.
meanings.sent4: The packnesses of the moving truck was like a well-organized puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The packnesses of the backpack made it easy to carry all the school supplies.
